TEXT.TITLE: STAN WEST <SWMC> SEEKS CONSTRUCTION FINANCING
TEXT.BODY: Stan West Mining Corp said it engaged an investment banking firm to act as financial adviser in arranging a construction financing package for McCabe mine. The company said it intends proceeds of the financing package would be utilized to construct a 500 ton per day mil, complete the underground construction necessary to start mining and provide working capital. Reuter
